title: Siberia: The Railway in peoples lives
brief_description: Relates the establishment of the railway to the economic development of Siberia. Discusses how the railway has influenced patterns of settlement and shows how it serves communities en route.
description: Relates the establishment of the railway to the economic development of Siberia. Discusses how the railway has influenced patterns of settlement and shows how it serves communities en route.
